commit message: Use entirely black background in dark theme (not the default gradient)
Remove (now redundant) background from layouts to reduce overdraw
Fetch in-reply-to header when downloading envelope on IMAP accounts

PullToRefresh: use setMode() to restore mode in onRestoreInstanceState()

When restoring a mode != DISABLED with the current mode being DISABLED
the header and/or footer layout weren't added to the view. That's why we
now call setMode() instead of setting mMode directly.
